duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the oncology therapeutic area strategy and oversee a team of scientists and research associates.
Guide the development of oncology therapeutics from ideation through regulatory filings and phase 1.
Identify and advance new opportunities, targets, and modalities for BD opportunities.
Collaborate with various teams to develop and execute novel therapeutics and biobetters.
Collaborate with translational and clinical scientists to identify and validate biomarkers and indication selection for clinical development.
Support therapeutic product teams and collaborate with clinical and translational sciences colleagues to advance therapeutics.

education_certification.credential: Ph.D. in Immunology, Cancer Biology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
